Note: The Universal Parser is only available in DefectDojo Pro.

The Universal Parser is currently in Beta. See our announcement presentation for more information.

item.title: Universal Importer & DefectDojo-CLI
item.description: Note: The following external tools are DefectDojo Pro-only features. These binaries will not work unless they are connected to an instance with a DefectDojo Pro license.

item.title: Infrastructure scans / Smart Upload
item.description:
Note: Smart Upload is only available in DefectDojo Pro.

Smart upload is a specialized importer that ingests reports from infrastructure scanning tools, including:
